participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is friendly, patient, and has a great sense of humor, making him an excellent little league coach.
participant_1.background: i drive a mini van. coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i've five sons.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is adventurous, creative, and always looking for new experiences, whether it's through cooking or thrilling activities.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all.
